product_summary: WhatDo is an AI-powered travel planner that helps you discover, plan, and book your next adventure. With a vast database of destinations, attractions, and experiences, WhatDo makes it easy to create a personalized itinerary that meets your interests and budget.
product_pros: Wide range of destinations and experiences
Ability to book activities and tours
product_cons: May not be suitable for all budgets
May not cover all destinations in depth
Recommendations may be biased towards popular destinations
Requires an internet connection to use
May not provide real-time availability for activities

product_usecases.details: WhatDo can help you create a detailed itinerary for a trip that includes multiple cities. It will provide recommendations for attractions, restaurants, and activities in each city, and will help you book accommodations and transportation.
WhatDo's database includes a wide range of hidden gems that you might not find in other travel guides. It can help you discover unique experiences and off-the-beaten-path destinations.
WhatDo allows you to book activities and tours directly through the app. This can save you time and money, and it ensures that you're getting the best possible deals.

WhatDo uses a variety of factors to personalize its recommendations, including your travel preferences, budget, and interests. This ensures that you're getting recommendations that are tailored to your specific needs.
WhatDo allows you to share your itinerary with friends and family. This can be helpful for planning group trips or for getting feedback on your plans.

product_toolfor.details: WhatDo is a great tool for travelers of all types, whether you're planning a weekend getaway or a month-long adventure.
WhatDo can help travel agents create personalized itineraries for their clients quickly and easily.
WhatDo can help businesses plan corporate retreats and events.
WhatDo can help students plan budget-friendly trips and find discounts on activities and attractions.
WhatDo can help families find kid-friendly activities and attractions.

product_pricing: WhatDo offers a free plan with limited features. The premium plan costs $49 per year and includes unlimited access to all features.
